message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to purchase this item for $12000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while also providing an attractive opportunity for you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While we understand your valuation of the product, we must respectfully decline. We're unable to match that price but are willing to negotiate further. Considering the quality and unique features of our product, we would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000. This price still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while providing you with a competitive price.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. Considering the value it offers, we would like to extend a counteroffer of $10750. This price allows us to maintain a fair profit while still being competitive in the market. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10600 for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we are pleased to offer the product at $10800. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We believe this is a fair compromise that meets both our needs.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in trying to meet my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10700 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. Considering the value of the product and our position, we are willing to accept an offer of $10750. We hope this price satisfies both our needs.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $10650 for the product.
